get data from a private page:

```{r}

library(osfr)
library(dplyr)
iris2 <- osf_retrieve_file("deq3w") |> 
  osf_download(path = tempdir(), conflicts = "overwrite") |> 
  pull("local_path") |> 
  read.csv()
```
